column5: Just fried that batch in some butter without any breading.little salt and pepper.Got to change it up sometimes.
prov1800, check your PM's.
What did you all catch and where were.you.

I fished the Yellowstone river and caught browns n rainbows,I fished mainly near the small town of gardener mt.the wife and I traveled west to 5 other states also,it was a great 3 week road trip.Saw hundreds of wild game including 4 moose.

Sounds like a nice trip.Were you using a fly rod or spinning gear.lets see some pics.will try some stocked lakes here at some time we do have rainbows and spec lakes and a few spake lakes.Have a good and save Xmas Rod
I was throwing spinners at them,the pics are on my wife phone and I don't know how to put pics on here.thanks,you also along with the wife the master angler have a great holidays john.

Just hit little square box.and it will get a check mark.easy.even I got it figured.out.lol.can email me to or get yourself a real phone with data.haha.Might go tom or next day and get some more walleye had some last night no breading just fried in butter with some scalloped spuds.Merry Xmas to you to.Stay save with all this new crap going on.Even have cases here.

Looks like your eating healthy john,I suppose the next time I see you,you'll be on the cover of a walleye magazine in Ontario wearing a Speedo.haha,looks like a great meal and I'm sure plenty more to come.
If i ever get on the cover of à walleye magazine ill guarantee you I won't be in a Speedo.Lol.
What kind of structure are you fishing here?
Drop off from the beach.All sand and a trench from tug boats from old days.fìsh magnate.
How do you cook your walleye ? Looks great !

And so it starts.Ice shacks are out at Clarks KC landing on Edward Lake.Went over around 2:30.Left truck near shore and just walked to shack.Wayne drilled a couple of holes for us and turned heat on.Not real cold at -15c but bit of heat is nice.Got some minnows which there is no shortage off.LOL.I set up my sonar and bottom was loaded with walleyes.wayne fished with for about a 1/2 and we probably caught around 30 or so walleyes and then he left and I fished till 4:30.Hard to know many I caught after cause it was about every time I put my jig down.Alk kinds of sized fished.Pretty awesome first time on the ice and am ready for a walleye meal.Looked like at least 10-11" of ice so feel much better walking out for now.Even though we got a ton of snow few weeks ago there's not much on the ice. Great place to fish for anybody wanting some easy fishing.
Looks like you had a good time, thanks for the pics.
Right on John. Hoping to get some ice fishing in this year myself. PjShorthorn
Was a fun time.
You got some ice.
Awesome day, Congrats
We get lucky sometimes.lol.
Lucky minnows is what it takes.
The 60 or so we used wernt very lucky.LOL.Did you see brand new bait shack.You coming up this year.

If I was coming up I would have been there yesterday with you.they treat the bait well with a brand new house,looks nicer than what I live in lol.Spoiled *** minnows.I just got back from pounding the trout in Montana so I'll be close to home for the rest of the winter.
